Text: Duuuuuuuude, thank you so much... been waiting for these. I hate to be a begging bastard but could you upload episodes 2 and 3 or point us in the direction?

For those two epsiodes search Google for: 
The Nerdist S01E04-6 HDTV XviD-GEEX
Despite 4-6 numbers, those are really episodes 1, 2 and 3 of - so called - second season.
